channel.title: Posts on vis
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on vis

item.title: Primeira Visualização
item.description: Titulo bla const spec = { "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v2.json", "data": { "url":"https://api.insa.gov.br/reservatorios/12172/monitoramento", "format": { "type": "json", "property": "volumes", "parse": {"DataInformacao": "utc:%d/%m/%Y"} } }, "width": 680, "height": 290, "mark": "circle", "encoding": { "x": { "field": "DataInformacao", "timeUnit": "year", "type": "ordinal" }, "y": { "field": "DataInformacao", "timeUnit": "month", "type": "ordinal" }, "color": {"value": "#c49ed3"}, "size": { "field": "Volume", "type": "quantitative", "aggregate": "mean" } } }; vegaEmbed('#vis', spec).
